mcode Reference Model Version 1.0.0
shr.core

Entry Element ResearchSubject

Documentation:

Record of a subject's enrollment and participation in a research study.

Ancestors:
  • Resource
    • DomainResource
      • EntityOrRole
        • Role
          • ResearchSubject
Used By:
  • SubjectOfRecord

    • Field Summary

      Properties Defined Constraints Value
      ParticipationPeriod

      The point in time or span of time the participant is involved.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      ParticipationPeriod
      1..1
      ResearchStudy

      A clinical trial or similar research study. Reference: list of FDA data elements describing a research study: prsinfo.clinicaltrials.gov/definitions.html
      DataType
      Cardinality
      ref(ResearchStudy)
      1..1
      Patient

      A person in the role of a patient. Sometimes, the patient is not the subject of information in a clinical statement where the Patient is the SubjectOfRecord.

      SHR follows Argonaut and makes the value set binding on marital status required. MaritalStatus has a required binding in Argonaut, but an extensible binding in US-Core. To be feasible under both DSTU2 Argonaut and STU3 US-Core, the required binding strength is adopted.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      ref(Patient)
      1..1
      AssignedArm

      The name of the arm in the study the subject is expected to follow as part of this study.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      AssignedArm
      0..1
      ActualArm

      The name of the arm in the study the subject actually followed as part of this study.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      ActualArm
      0..1
      TerminationReason

      A code explaining unplanned or premature termination of a plan of treatment, course of medication, or research study.
      DataType
      Cardinality
      Value Set
      TerminationReason
      0..1
      http://hl7.org/fhir/us/mcode/shr/core/vs/ResearchSubjectTerminationReasonVS (REQUIRED)
